sn44.3:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn44.3:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn44.3:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.3:2.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.4: “Kiṃ panāvuso, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.7: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.9: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.3:2.10: “Kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.3:2.12: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.3:3.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno, ‘abyākataṃ kho etaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā—
sn44.3:3.3: ‘kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.3:3.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.3:3.6: Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.3:4.1: “Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.2: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.3: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.4: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, rūpagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.5: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.6: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.7: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.8: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, vedanāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.9: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.10: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.11: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.12: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saññāgatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.13: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.14: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.15: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.16: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, saṅkhāragatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.17: Hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti kho, āvuso, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.18: Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.19: Hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.20: Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti, viññāṇagatametaṃ.
sn44.3:4.21: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
